trans-unit.source: Provides an editor control that enables end users to edit several user interface (UI) properties on an associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Fornece um controle de editor que permite aos usuários finais editar várias propriedades de interface de usuário em um associado <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: The AppearanceEditorPart class is an editor control that derives from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> class, and is used to edit properties that affect the appearance of an associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> or other server control.
trans-unit.target: A classe AppearanceEditorPart é um controle de editor que deriva de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>classe e é usado para editar as propriedades que afetam a aparência de um associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>ou outro controle de servidor.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: The AppearanceEditorPart control enables end users to edit several UI properties of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: O controle de AppearanceEditorPart permite que os usuários finais editar várias propriedades de interface do usuário de um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The type of control that appears in the page to edit each property value is listed in the adjacent cell of the following table.
trans-unit.target: O tipo de controle que aparece na página para editar o valor de cada propriedade é listado na célula adjacente da tabela a seguir.

trans-unit.source: |Property|Control used to edit property| |--------------|-----------------------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Title%2A>|A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> control is used to set the text for the title.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.ChromeType%2A>|A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> control is used to select what type of title-and-border option is used.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Direction%2A>|A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> control is used to select the direction that content flows on the page.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Height%2A>|A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> control is used to set a number for the height, and a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> control is used to select the units.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Width%2A>|A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> control is used to set a number for the height, and a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> control is used to select the units.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Hidden%2A>|A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox> control is used to indicate whether the control is hidden.| The AppearanceEditorPart control becomes visible only when a Web Parts page is in edit mode, and when a specific <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control has been selected for editing.
trans-unit.target: | Propriedade | Usado para editar a propriedade de controle | |--------------|-----------------------------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Title%2A>| Um controle <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>é usado para definir o texto do título. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.ChromeType%2A>| Um controle <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>é usado para selecionar o tipo de opção de título e borda é usado. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Direction%2A>| Um controle <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>é usado para selecionar a direção do fluxo de conteúdo na página. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Height%2A>| Um controle <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>é usado para definir um número para a altura e um controle <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>é usado para selecionar as unidades. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Width%2A>| Um controle <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>é usado para definir um número para a altura e um controle <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>é usado para selecionar as unidades. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Hidden%2A>| Um controle <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox>é usado para indicar se o controle está oculto. | O controle AppearanceEditorPart fica visível apenas quando uma página de Web Parts está em modo de edição e quando um determinado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controle foi selecionado para edição.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Hidden%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Width%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Height%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Direction%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.ChromeType%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Title%2A>

trans-unit.source: The AppearanceEditorPart control, like all other <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls, resides in an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone> zone.
trans-unit.target: O controle de AppearanceEditorPart, como todos os outros <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controla, reside em um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone>zona.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > An <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone> zone can contain only <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls cannot be placed in any other type of zone.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > Um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone>zona só pode conter <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controles, e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controles não podem ser colocados em qualquer outro tipo de zona.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone>

trans-unit.source: The AppearanceEditorPart class has a minimal set of properties.
trans-unit.target: A classe AppearanceEditorPart tem um conjunto mínimo de propriedades.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart.Title%2A> property is used to get or set a string that is displayed as a title when the control is visible.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart.Title%2A>propriedade é usada para obter ou definir uma cadeia de caracteres que é exibida como título quando o controle está visível.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart.Title%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart.DefaultButton%2A> property sets the inherited property from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> control, so that the default control that receives the focus within the AppearanceEditorPart control is the same as the default in the base <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart.DefaultButton%2A>propriedade define a propriedade herdada do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel>controlar, de forma que o controle padrão que recebe o foco dentro do controle AppearanceEditorPart é o mesmo que o padrão na base de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart.DefaultButton%2A>

trans-unit.source: The AppearanceEditorPart class also has two important methods.
trans-unit.target: A classe AppearanceEditorPart também tem dois métodos importantes.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart.SyncChanges%2A> method overrides the base method from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> class.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart.SyncChanges%2A>método substitui o método base da <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>classe</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> de</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart.SyncChanges%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method is critical because it enables getting the property values from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control it is editing and assigning them to the fields in the editor control.
trans-unit.target: Esse método é fundamental, porque ele permite obter os valores de propriedade de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controle é edição e atribuindo-os para os campos de controle de editor.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A> method is also important, because it takes the values set by the user in the editing controls, and updates those property values on the control being edited.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A>método também é importante, porque usa os valores definidos pelo usuário nos controles de edição e atualiza os valores de propriedade do controle que está sendo editado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A>

trans-unit.source: In most cases the AppearanceEditorPart control should be used in page persistence format by declaring an `<asp:appearanceditorpart>` element inside a `<zonetemplate>` element, which is in turn contained by an `<asp:editorzone>` element on a Web page.
trans-unit.target: Na maioria dos casos o AppearanceEditorPart controle deve ser usado em formato de persistência da página, declarando um `<asp:appearanceditorpart>` elemento dentro de um `<zonetemplate>` elemento, que por sua vez, está contido por um `<asp:editorzone>` elemento em uma página da Web.

trans-unit.source: To edit other properties and behavior of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls, you can use the other <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls supplied with the Web Parts control set.
trans-unit.target: Para editar outras propriedades e o comportamento de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controles, você pode usar outros <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controles fornecidos com o conjunto de controles de Web Parts.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: These controls include the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart>.
trans-unit.target: Esses controles incluem o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>, o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: The supplied <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls should provide most editing features required to edit <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls, but you can also create a custom editor control by inheriting from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> class.
trans-unit.target: Fornecido <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controles devem fornecer a maioria dos recursos de edição necessárias para editar <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>os controles, mas você também pode criar um controle editor personalizado por herança da <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>classe</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> de</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: For a code example, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> class overview topic.
trans-unit.target: Para obter um exemplo de código, consulte o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>tópico de visão geral da classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To improve accessibility, the AppearanceEditorPart control is rendered within a `<fieldset>` element.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Para melhorar o acesso, o controle AppearanceEditorPart é renderizado dentro de um `<fieldset>` elemento.

trans-unit.source: The `<fieldset>` element groups the related set of controls used for editing in the AppearanceEditorPart control, and it facilitates tabbed navigation among those controls for both visual (such as ordinary Web browsers) and speech-oriented user agents (such as screen-reading software).
trans-unit.target: O `<fieldset>` elemento agrupa um conjunto relacionado de controles usados para edição no controle AppearanceEditorPart e facilita a navegação com guias entre esses controles para visual (como navegadores comuns) e agentes de usuário orientada a fala (como o software de leitura de tela).

trans-unit.source: Accessibility The markup rendered by default for this control might not conform to accessibility standards such as the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 1.0 (WCAG) priority 1 guidelines.
trans-unit.target: Acessibilidade a marcação processada por padrão para este controle pode não estar de acordo com os padrões de acessibilidade, como as diretrizes de prioridade 1 conteúdo WCAG Web Accessibility Guidelines 1.0 ().

trans-unit.source: For details about accessibility support for this control, see [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter detalhes sobre o suporte de acessibilidade para este controle, consulte [controles ASP.NET e acessibilidade](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Saves the values from an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart"></xref> control to the corresponding properties in the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Salva os valores de uma <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart"> </xref> controle para as propriedades correspondentes na associado <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: The ApplyChanges method is a critical method on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart> control.
trans-unit.target: O método ApplyChanges é um método crítico em um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: It is called when the user clicks a button representing an OK or an apply verb in the editing user interface (UI).
trans-unit.target: Ele é chamado quando o usuário clica em um botão que representa um Okey ou um verbo aplicar na interface do usuário edição (IU).

trans-unit.source: The method's purpose is to save the values a user has set on an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart> control to the corresponding properties in the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: Finalidade do método é salvar os valores que um usuário tiver definido em um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart>controle para as propriedades correspondentes na associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: The associated control is referenced in the inherited <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.WebPartToEdit%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O controle associado é referenciado no herdadas <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.WebPartToEdit%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.WebPartToEdit%2A>

trans-unit.source: The ApplyChanges method attempts to set the following properties on the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control: - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Title%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.ChromeType%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Direction%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Height%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Width%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Hidden%2A>
trans-unit.target: O método ApplyChanges tenta definir as propriedades a seguir em associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controle:- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Title%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.ChromeType%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Direction%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Height%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Width%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Hidden%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Hidden%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Width%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Height%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Direction%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.ChromeType%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Title%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the action of saving values from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart"></xref> control to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control is successful; otherwise (if an error occurs), <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a ação de salvar os valores do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart"> </xref> o controle para o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controle for bem-sucedida; caso contrário (se ocorrer um erro), <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An error occurs when setting the value for any of the following properties on the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control that is being edited: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Title*> <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.ChromeType*> <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Direction*> <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Height*> <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Width*> <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Hidden*>
trans-unit.target: Ocorre um erro ao definir o valor de qualquer uma das seguintes propriedades no <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controle que está sendo editada: <> </> *> <> </> *> <> </> *> <> </> *> <> </> *><>*>

trans-unit.source: Overrides the base property inherited from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel"></xref> control to hide the property from designers and prevent it from being affected by themes.
trans-unit.target: Substitui a propriedade base herdada da <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel"> </xref> controle para ocultar a propriedade de designers e impedir que sejam afetados por temas.

trans-unit.source: Though it is public, this property is used for default rendering of this control and is not intended to be called from developer code.
trans-unit.target: Embora seja público, essa propriedade é usada para a renderização padrão deste controle e não se destina a ser chamado no código do desenvolvedor.

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade não pode ser definida por temas ou temas de folha de estilo.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>e [capas e temas do ASP.NET](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the ID of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button"></xref> control that receives the default focus in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que contém a ID do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button"> </xref> controle que recebe o foco padrão em um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the property values from a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control and assigns them to the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Recupera os valores de propriedade de um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> de controle e os atribui associados <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: The SyncChanges method is a critical method on an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart> control.
trans-unit.target: O método SyncChanges é um método crítico em um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: It implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.SyncChanges%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method from the base class, retrieves the current values from the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, and updates the controls in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart> control with those values so a user can edit them.
trans-unit.target: Ele implementa o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.SyncChanges%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método da classe base, recupera os valores atuais de associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlar e atualiza os controles de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart>controle com esses valores para um usuário pode editá-los.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.SyncChanges%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The SyncChanges method is called whenever the values in the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control might have changed.
trans-unit.target: O método SyncChanges é chamado sempre que os valores associados <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controle pode ter alterado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: For an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart> control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase> zone that contains the control calls the SyncChanges method, so that the values in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart> control are always synchronized with the values in the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: Para um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart>controle, o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase>zona que contém o controle chama o método SyncChanges, para que os valores de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart>controle sempre são sincronizados com os valores associados <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: Another case where the SyncChanges method is called is when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control is entering edit mode.
trans-unit.target: Outro caso em que o método SyncChanges é chamado é quando um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controle está no modo de edição.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a title for the editor control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um título para o controle de editor.

trans-unit.source: The Title property value is displayed in the title bar of an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart> control when the control is visible in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade Title é exibido na barra de título de um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart>controlar quando o controle está visível no modo de edição.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: When the control is declared in a page, you can set a value for the `Title` attribute.
trans-unit.target: Quando o controle for declarado em uma página, você pode definir um valor para o `Title` atributo.

trans-unit.source: If you do not supply a value for the title, a culture-specific default value is used to describe the kinds of properties that this control allows users to edit.
trans-unit.target: Se você não fornecer um valor para o título, um valor específico da cultura padrão é usado para descrever os tipos de propriedades que esse controle permite que os usuários editem.

trans-unit.source: A string that is used as the title of the control.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que é usada como o título do controle.

trans-unit.source: The default value is a calculated control name supplied by the Web Parts control set.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é um nome de controle calculado fornecidas pelo conjunto de controle de Web Parts.
